short.ar: استخراج ما يصل إلى 50,000 متابعين ومتابعين لكل ملف تعريف. اختر إلى تنسيقات CSV و Excel.
short.am: እያንዳንዱ መገለጫ እስከ 50,000 የኢንስትግራም ተከታታዮችን እና መከታተያዎችን ያስረክቡ። ወደ CSV እና Excel ቅርጸት ያንሱ።
short.bg: Извличане на до 50,000 последователи и следващи в Instagram на профил. Избор на формати CSV и Excel.
short.bn: প্রতি প্রোফাইলে 50,000 পর্যন্ত ইনস্টাগ্রাম ফলোয়ার এবং ফলোইং তথ্য এক্সট্র্যাক্ট করুন। CSV এবং Excel ফরম্যাটে নির্বাচন করুন।

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IG Exporter & Scraper is a powerful Google Chrome extension and scraping tool for gathering up to 50,000 Instagram followers and followings per profile. Export your data effortlessly into CSV and Excel formats, covering both followers and following lists. Perfect for analytics, content management, and social media strategies. Use this best-in-class online service to scrape data from Instagram for free, making it the ideal web scraping tool!

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬  How to Use ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
1. Click Ins Tools - Ins Follower Export Tool icon, which is on browser toolbar, then open IGTools popup page via IGTools Net
2. Click "Export Instagram Data" button, an IGTools option page will be opened.
3. Input a valid IG profile URL or IG username
4. Click "Start export" button, and our IG Tools will run automatically. After this processing is finished, you can download IG followers or IG followings to CSV or Excel. 

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ Features ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
● Export IG followers and IG following with one click by extension
● Export up to 50K IG followers or IG following
● CSV and Excel formats support
● Handles IG rate limit errors
● Processing in one click via IGTools net

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ Supported columns ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
- ID
- Username
- Full name
- Profile picture url
- Is verified
- followed_by_viewer
- requested_by_viewer

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ Security ▬▬▬▬▬▬
● The extension neither ask for your IG password, nor any of your data including IG user information, story, visit history, posts, and social relationships.
● IG enforces IG rate limit, i.e. limit on the number of requests. The rate limit is not public information and varies depending on your IP address.

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ How it works in IG Follower Export tool ▬▬▬▬▬▬
● After every time you get 50 users the extension goes to Cool down minimum 10 seconds (you can change it in settings tab).
